Item.Value: [Text:Well now, there's an adventurer if I've ever seen one. Welcome to town! I'm $Character_19$, and I run the General Store. I'm sure I've got all manner of useful things in stock for you.]
[Text:Hello! You know, my family has been living in this town for over a century. It may not look like much, but this town runs in my blood.]
[Text:Lovely day today, isn't it? It's a wonder what some fresh air will do for you!]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you? {Talk-Talk|Construct Buildings-BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings-Maintenance|Never Mind-Cancel}]
[Text:Well now, what can I do for you?{Talk-Talk|Gift-GiveGift|Never Mind-Cancel}]
[Text:What are you doing running around today? On a day like this, you should be inside where it's warm and dry.]

[Text:My father used to tell me stories about nature spirits when I was a lad. Apparently some of them like to play in the rain. I fancy I can sometimes hear one, but I've never seen one with my own eyes.]
